name: Fashion Expert
description: Specialized in translating fashion-related content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for fashion terms, clothing, accessories, and fashion-related content.
author: immersive

zh-CN.name: 时尚专家
zh-CN.description: 专门翻译时尚相关内容，确保时尚术语、服装、配饰和时尚相关内容的准确性和地道性。

zh-TW.name: 時尚專家
zh-TW.description: 專門翻譯時尚相關內容，確保時尚術語、服裝、配飾和時尚相關內容的準確與地道翻譯。
